pullRequest.title: Handle Ballerina reserved literal name when generating code from proto(1.1.x)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Fix the issue when generating the code from the proto definition which has ballerina reserved literal name as the field names.
Fixes #20837
Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples

commit.message: Handle Ballereina reserved literal name when generating code from proto

nodes.bodyText: Isn't it difficult to maintain this in the future as we have to change this array whenever new reserved word is adding to the language? There is a possibility to miss this.
